just been thinking about this lol
summary: honestly what made me laugh about all the “brie larson can’t act/looks bored all the time” sewage coming from dumb fanboys after...
body:
honestly what made me laugh about all the “brie larson can’t act/looks bored all the time” sewage coming from dumb fanboys after the cm trailer dropped is that when people would try to defend her/the trailer, the fanboys would be all “uhhh well she was like that in kong skull island too so” and like agshsjshdhd THAT’S your argument??? that she was bad in kong?? skull island???? EVERYONE was bad in kong cause uhhhh guess what… it was a bad movie folks. like there were only two (2) good things about k:si and they were the cgi and the fact that larry fong is very good at what he does but thAT’S IT!!


like im so sorry that you consider kong skull island a cinematic masterpiece and that her performance soured the movie for you LMAO

summary: Brie Larson responde com ironia críticas que apontaram falta de sorrisos no teaser de 'Capitã Marvel'
title: Brie Larson responde com ironia críticas que apontaram falta de sorrisos no teaser de 'Capitã Marvel'
body:
Achou que o lançamento do primeiro teaser de ‘Capitã Marvel’ ia passar sem polêmicas pela internet? Pois é claro que não. Desde terça-feira, quando o vídeo oficial caiu na rede, parte do público reclamou que a personagem está muito séria nas imagens e sorri pouco.

Um usuário do Twitter chegou a editar alguns momentos e incluir sorrisos na heroína. “Corrigi Capitã Marvel”, escreveu na postagem:

I fixed #CaptainMarvel! Thanks @faceapp_ai.@DiversityAndCmx @TheQuartering @OneAngryGamerHD pic.twitter.com/SWx1ReRuJN

— Turd Flinging Monkey (@TFMonkeyYouTube) 18 de setembro de 2018

Do outro lado, houve quem viu nestas reclamações uma demonstração de como o machismo e a objetificação das mulheres está presente até nas pequenas coisas. Isso porque é sempre cobrado um tipo de postura supostamente simpática e amigável das mulheres, enquanto com os homens não acontece o mesmo.

Brie Larson, atriz que interpreta a personagem, resolveu demonstrar de forma didática e irônica esta diferença no tratamento. Através do Instagram Stories, ela compartilhou pôsteres dos filmes de outros heróis da Marvel e adicionou sorrisos, para demonstrar como estes ficariam completamente fora de contexto. Veja abaixo:

summary:
they should make the captain marvel cast read thirst tweets tbh
Ben would get all sorts of tweets calling him daddy and I bet he...

they should make the captain marvel cast read thirst tweets tbh

Ben would get all sorts of tweets calling him daddy and I bet he would be embarrassed and be like, “well, I’m a dad…I guess that’s why they’re calling me daddy.” And Brie Larson just fucking facepalms

blog.name: tristuscus
blog.title: A Gamer/Sh1t Artist
blog.description: Games, Movies/TV and Art. I like to make video game gifs in poor quality sometimes. I also make fun but sh1tty doodles and animations. I am very open minded and I have no problems talking to people (most of the time). If y'all want a sh1tty doodle, I'm more than happy to make one. Just, ya know.. keep in mind I like to make "sh1tty" doodles. So it's just for fun 😂

body:
Captain Marvel

This movie looks awesome and I’m a fan of Brie Larson. I don’t know why the hell there are some men complaining that she isn’t smiling in the trailer.

They must not be paying attention to the fact that she’s in the middle of fighting some aliens that can shapeshift and most likely isn’t sure who she can trust! Why the hell would she be smiling in this situation.

“Mmm let me walk around with a big ass grin on my face while hunting down aliens in my kickass spacesuit.”

Dumbasses
